```{r}
library(assertthat)

my.log <- function(x) {
    assert_that(is.numeric(x), length(x) > 0, all(!is.na(x)), all(x >= 0))
}

my.log(c(1, NA, 3))

```

```{r}
# library(assertive)
if (!require(assertive)) install.packages("assertive")

my.log <- function(x) {
    assert_is_numeric(x)
    assert_is_non_empty(x)
    assert_all_are_not_na(x)
    assert_all_are_greater_than_or_equal_to(x, 0)
}

my.log(c(1, NA, 3))


```
